Question 17 
 
  
 
 
[Data Structure (Graph)]
 
 
Let 
A
 be the adjacency matrix of a simple undirected graph 
G
. Suppose 
A
 is its own inverse. Which one
of the following statements is always TRUE?

G 
is a cycle 
(B) 
G
 is a perfect matching
(C) 
G
 is a complete graph
